channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-5507] ThriftServerRunner.HbaseHandler.getRegionInfo() and getTableRegions() do not use ByteBuffer correctly
item.description: We observed that when with "framed transport" option. The thrift call ThriftServerRunner.HbaseHandler.getRegionInfo() receives corrupted parameter (some garbage string attached to the beginning). This may be a thrift bug requires further investigation.
item.summary: ThriftServerRunner.HbaseHandler.getRegionInfo() and getTableRegions() do not use ByteBuffer correctly

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I also created a thrift JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/THRIFT-1531

sc requested code review of "HBASE-5507 [jira] ThriftServerRunner.HbaseHandler.getRegionInfo() and getTableRegions() do not use ByteBuffer correctly".
Reviewers: tedyu, dhruba, JIRA

ThriftServerRunner.HbaseHandler.getRegionInfo() and getTableRegions() do not use ByteBuffer correctly

Task ID: #

Blame Rev:

We observed that when with "framed transport" option. The thrift call ThriftServerRunner.HbaseHandler.getRegionInfo() receives corrupted parameter (some garbage string attached to the beginning). This may be a thrift bug requires further investigation.

TEST PLAN
unit test

Revert Plan:

Tags:

REVISION DETAIL
https://reviews.facebook.net/D2073

src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/HRegionThriftServer.java

src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/thrift/TestThriftServerCmdLine.java
